title: Music is medicine, music is sanity
description: Robert Gupta, violinist with the LA Philharmonic, talks about a violin lesson he once gave to a brilliant, schizophrenic musician -- and what he learned. Called back onstage later, Gupta plays his own transcription of the prelude from Bach's Cello Suite No. 1.
author: Robert Gupta
keywords: TED, talks, TED Fellows, brain, entertainment, live music, mental health, music, violin, performance
